header.menuDescription: A list of navigation links to browse the different sections of the page.

hero.subtitle: Software Engineer | Scalable Architectures | APIs & Cloud (AWS/GCP)

about.title: About Me
about.description: Software Engineer with experience building scalable and secure applications, ranging from monoliths to microservices and event-driven architectures. Skilled in technologies such as NestJS, Python, Django, Next.js, PostgreSQL, GCP, and AWS, applying Clean Architecture principles, CI/CD, and security best practices. Experienced in API design, third-party integrations, and implementing AI-powered solutions. Recognized for managing end-to-end projects, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and consistently delivering business value.

medical-appointment-scheduling.title: Medical Appointment Scheduling System
medical-appointment-scheduling.description: A complete web application to schedule, modify, and cancel medical appointments, optimizing the workflow and patient management in health centers.

bank-cli.title: Bank Command Line Interface (CLI)
bank-cli.description: A console tool to simulate basic banking operations such as transfers, deposits, and balance inquiries, ideal for educational or simulation purposes.

portfolio-stock.title: Investment Portfolio Tracker
portfolio-stock.description: An application to monitor the performance of a stock portfolio in real-time, using data from external financial APIs and visualizing key metrics.

challenge-poke.title: Pokémon Challenge (Pokedex)
challenge-poke.description: An interactive project developed as a challenge, likely a full Pokedex to search, filter, and view detailed information about different Pokémon using a public API.

get-that-home.title: Get That Home
get-that-home.description: A property search platform (houses, apartments) with advanced filters, a user-friendly interface, and visualization of relevant details for decision-making.

econuni-2016.title: ECON UNI Congress Official Website (2016)
econuni-2016.description: Official website for the Electronic Engineering Congress (ECONUNI) of the National University of Engineering (UNI) from 2016, developed using the MVC pattern.

description: Led the complete development of products from ideation to production deployment, ensuring technical quality and achievement of objectives.

Used modern technologies such as NestJS for the backend and Next.js for the frontend, in a monorepo with clean architecture, integrating artificial intelligence services (First AI) as a central part of the educational proposal.
Developed and integrated services and APIs in Python, Node.js, AWS, and GCP for internal and external system functionalities.
Developed and maintained a monolith with Python and Django.
Designed integrations with third-party services using REST and asynchronous events (Pub/Sub).
Implemented support and automatic onboarding tools for clients and users.
Coordinated directly with non-technical teams (Support, Customer Success, and Sales) to enable automated and monitorable workflows.
Backend with NestJS and Google Cloud Platform: Developed, maintained, and deployed backend systems with Clean Architecture, using GCP services.
Configured microservices with Docker and automated deployment with GitHub Actions, event-based architecture, improving scalability, performance, and adaptability to business needs.
awards: 2nd place in Betterfly AI Hackathon 2023 (integration of GPT in benefits search engine).

description: Developed functionalities in both frontend and backend, using Angular, Python, and SQL and NoSQL databases.
Integrated external APIs for specific functionalities of institutional clients.
Participated in agile processes and supported the QA and support team in technical validation.
awards: 3rd place in Socialab's HR21 Hackathon: Created a gamified solution to reduce talent turnover in startups, based on personalized benefits.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: If you'd like to work with me or have any questions, don’t hesitate to get in touch.
contact.availability: I am available for development projects, collaborations, and consultations.
